title: Quantum corrections for D=4 black holes and D=5 strings
abstract: In recent times quantum corrections for N=2 black holes in 4 dimensions have been addressed in the framework of double extreme black hole solutions, which are characterised by constant scalar fields. In this paper we generalize these solutions to non-constant scalar fields. This enables us to discuss quantum corrections for massless black holes and for configurations that are classically singular. We also discuss the relation to the 5-dimensional magnetic string solution.
